sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function ThrillerEditRow({ thrillerState, editRowKey, removeMovie, setEditRowKey }) { //This below is the only error so far. const [editRowFormInput, setEditRowFormInput] = useState({ name: thrillerState.filter(f => f.id === editRowKey)[0].name, year: thrillerState.filter(f => f.id === editRowKey)[0].year, rating: thrillerState.filter(f => f.id === editRowKey)[0].rating, }) const activateRemoveMovieFromEdit = (movieId) => { removeMovie(movieId) } const activateSetEditRowKeyFromEdit = (clickedKey) => { setEditRowKey(clickedKey) } return ( <> {thrillerState.map((m, i) => (m.id === editRowKey) ? {i + 1} : {i + 1} {m.name} {m.year} {m.rating} ) } ) }
